enhanced_description: Established in 2004, LTT Global Communications Sdn Bhd is a global pioneer in EdTech, specializing in Mobile Learning and Learning Experience Platforms (LXP). They are recognized as world-class content curation experts for various industries and communities, offering high-quality educational content accessible anywhere, anytime, across all disciplines for upskilling. LTT Global emphasizes a personalized approach to ensure optimal educational experiences for learners. Their multi-award-winning learning platforms have received recognition from prestigious organizations including the United Nations, the Organisation for Economic Cooperation & Development (OECD), and ITU as a proven Capacity Building Platform. LTT Global serves as a trusted partner for both businesses and universities, enabling them to provide high-quality educational content to their employees and students.
